DataElement.preferredName: TAPS Tool - Interviewer Version 1.0 Past 3 Months Used Any Other Drug Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of whether or not they used any other drug in the past three months.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: TAPS Tool - Interviewer Version Past 3 Months Use Any Other Drug
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An instrument designed to screen and assess adult primary care patients for tobacco, alcohol, prescription drug, and drug use and problems related to their use._A period of time consisting of the 3 months before the present._A question about whether an individual uses or used any other drug.

Concepts.definition: An instrument designed to screen and assess adult primary care patients for tobacco, alcohol, prescription drug, and drug use and problems related to their use.

A question about whether an individual uses or used any other drug.
